# Baring Archive Class Trip

We will be taking a class trip to the Baring Archive in the city for an introduction to some of the material held on a leading financial institution once described as the 'sixth great power'.

Our tour will start at 10:30 am. Please arrive at 10:15 at 8-10 Moorgate London EC2R 6DA.
